ivardefs.name: authoredOn
ivardefs.desc: The date (and perhaps time) when the prescription was initially written or authored on.

ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: A plan or request that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this medication request.

ivardefs.name: category
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the type of medication order and where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered.

ivardefs.name: context
ivardefs.desc: A link to an encounter, or episode of care, that identifies the particular occurrence or set occurrences of contact between patient and health care provider.

ivardefs.name: definition_
ivardefs.desc: Protocol or definition followed by this request.

ivardefs.name: detectedIssue_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates an actual or potential clinical issue with or between one or more active or proposed clinical actions for a patient; e.g. Drug-drug interaction, duplicate therapy, dosage alert etc.

ivardefs.name: dispenseRequest
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the specific details for the dispense or medication supply part of a medication request (also known as a Medication Prescription or Medication Order).  Note that this information is not always sent with the order.  There may be in some settings

ivardefs.name: dosageInstruction_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates how the medication is to be used by the patient.

ivardefs.name: eventHistory_
ivardefs.desc: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this resource or fulfilling request or event resources that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the resource.

ivardefs.name: groupIdentifier
ivardefs.desc: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition or prescription.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: This records identifiers associated with this medication request that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate. For example a re-imbursement system might issue its o

ivardefs.name: intent
ivardefs.desc: Whether the request is a proposal, plan, or an original order.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Extra information about the prescription that could not be conveyed by the other attributes.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: Indicates how quickly the Medication Request should be addressed with respect to other requests.

ivardefs.name: priorPrescription
ivardefs.desc: A link to a resource representing an earlier order related order or prescription.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: The reason or the indication for ordering the medication.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Condition or observation that supports why the medication was ordered.

ivardefs.name: recorder
ivardefs.desc: The person who entered the order on behalf of another individual for example in the case of a verbal or a telephone order.

ivardefs.name: requester
ivardefs.desc: The individual, organization or device that initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: A code specifying the current state of the order.  Generally this will be active or completed state.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: A link to a resource representing the person or set of individuals to whom the medication will be given.

ivardefs.name: substitution
ivardefs.desc: Indicates whether or not substitution can or should be part of the dispense. In some cases substitution must happen, in other cases substitution must not happen. This block explains the prescriber's intent. If nothing is specified substitution may be done

ivardefs.name: supportingInformation_
ivardefs.desc: Include additional information (for example, patient height and weight) that supports the ordering of the medication.
